title: Problem solving
description: I can solve a problem I have with a device or digital service using online help (e.g. Google, YouTube, forums)
choices: I think I can but I might need help
I'm not sure what you mean

title: Communicating
description: Select which of these you could confidently teach a colleague
choices: Use calendars, including shared calendars and create meetings
Attach files or internet links to an email (e.g. documents and websites)
Delete an email and am aware of how to recover deleted emails
Understand follow up flags and importance markers
Can carry out housekeeping and ensure storage limit is not exceeded (e.g. in Outlook)
Use the 'out of office assistant' for the days I'm not working
Send a personal message to another person using online messaging services (e.g. Twitter, Facebook)
Carefully and clearly make comments and share information online (e.g. on forums)
Collaborate with others using collaboration tools or forums (e.g. Lync)
